features: ONE ESSENTIAL SOLUTION: Aquaphor is one essential solution for many skin care needs; use on dry, cracked skin, as a lip moisturizer, facial moisturizer, hydrating mask, minor wound care and much more
FOR DRY, COMPROMISED SKIN: This Aquaphor Healing Ointment is designed specifically for dry, compromised skin and clinically proven to restore smooth, healthy skin
CONVENIENT REPLACEMENT: Use Aquaphor Healing Ointment as a replacement for a foot cream or hand cream to help heal dry cracked hands, cuticles and feet

IDEAL FOR HEALING: Different from a body lotion or cream, this ointment is water-free, and soothes skin while creating a protective barrier that allows for the flow of oxygen to create an ideal healing environment
INCLUDES: one (1) 7 ounce tube of Aquaphor Healing Ointment Advanced Therapy Skin Protectant
body.description: Aquaphor Healing Ointment Advanced Therapy Skin Protectant is a multi-purpose solution for many skincare needs. This body moisturizer ointment is ideal for dry, compromised skin and is clinically proven to restore smooth, healthy looking skin. Aquaphor is the #1 dermatologist recommended brand for dry, cracked skin and minor wound care (1), and this dry skin ointment soothes and helps protect skin to enhance healing from skin irritations such as minor cuts and burns, cracked cuticles and dry feet, heels, hands and lips. Aquaphor Healing Ointment can also help prevent chafing and protect skin from drying effects of wind and cold weather. This skin ointment creates a protective barrier on the skin that also allows for the flow of oxygen and excess fluid to create an ideal healing environment. This unique ointment is formulated with Petrolatum (skin protectant) plus Provitamin B5, Bisabolol, Glycerin and Lanolin Alcohol to protect, soothe and moisturize skin so you can get on with your day comfortably. Each of the ingredients in Aquaphor skin care products are tested and approved for their quality and safety, and suitability for dry, compromised skin. (1) ProVoice survey, January 2017.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aquaphor Healing Ointment Meet Our Ultimate Skincare Multi-Tasker One essential solution for many skincare needs: Aquaphor Healing Ointment is uniquely formulated to restore smooth, healthy skin. Different from a lotion or cream, this multi-purpose ointment is water-free, and it protects and soothes extremely dry skin, chapped lips, cracked hands and feet, minor cuts and burns, and many other skin irritations, so you can get on with your day comfortably.

Aquaphor Healing Ointment How Aquaphor Healing Ointment Helps Skin Heal Aquaphor Healing Ointment creates a protective barrier on the skin that allows for the flow of hydration and oxygen. The barrier also helps keep in skin’s own moisture to create an ideal healing environment.

How is Aquaphor Healing Ointment different from a body lotion or body cream? Different from a lotion or cream, Aquaphor Healing Ointment nourishes skin while creating a protective barrier that allows for the flow of oxygen, to create an ideal healing environment. Can Aquaphor Healing Ointment be used as a lip moisturizer, as well as a dry skin ointment? Yes! Aquaphor is a great option for chapped or cracked lips, and can also soothe extremely dry skin, cracked hands and feet, can be used as a wound care ointment for minor cuts and burns, and many other skin irritations. How does Aquaphor work to protect skin? Aquaphor Healing Ointment creates a protective barrier on the skin that allows flow of excess fluid and oxygen. This barrier also keeps in skin's own moisture, which creates an ideal healing environment.

Find the Aquaphor Product For You Aquaphor Healing Ointment Aquaphor Healing Balm Stick Aquaphor Ointment Body Spray FOR DRY CRACKED SKIN Protects and helps relieve FOR CHAPPED, CHAFED SKIN Provides soothing care for chafed, dry, irritated skin FOR DRY ROUGH SKIN Intensively moisturizes to help heal IDEAL SIZE For the whole family IDEAL SIZE Convenient, mess-free application EASY TO APPLY Even on hard to reach places like the back. PROTECTS AND SOOTHES Minor cuts, scrapes and burns ENRICHED WITH Avocado oil and shea butter, leaving skin feeling moisturized and protected CONTINUOUS SPRAY Goes on evenly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The holy grail for chapped lips!
reviews.reviewText: I don't know what black magic is in this tube, but it WORKS!I used to have the most chronically chapped and peeling lips ever. I tried everything - drinking tons of water, applying Chapstick, Burt's Bees, Carmex, O'Keefe's, and even Vaseline throughout the day...some brands were better for my lips than others, but I always had to re-apply them anywhere from hours to minutes later. The peeling skin was always there, the chapstick just kinda stuck it down, but eventually the chapstick would dry from my lips and the skin would come up again.I could never wear lipstick because it looked awful with my peeling skin. I developed a nervous habit of chewing on my lips, trying to bite off the peeling skin, which of course was a vicious negative spiral which caused my lips to peel more and eventually bleed. The only relief I could get was with super hydrating lip gloss, but then my lips were glittery and super shiny and wet looking, which made me look like a teenager lost in the 90s. I wanted matte-lipped sophistication, damnit!Then I tried Aquaphor. I figured, why not, I've tried everything else, and this big tube is pretty cheap. When I first opened it, I thought it was basically repackaged Vaseline based on its consistency. Vaseline hadn't worked for me in the past so I was a bit disappointed, but smeared a little on my lips right before bed anyways. The next morning, my lips were still moist from the product. I washed my face and wiped off my lips. The dry, dead, peeling skin from the night before had been moisturized into goo that just wiped off, revealing seamlessly healthy skin underneath. No cracks. No edges of dead skin that would start peeling again. Just perfectly moisturized lips like all of the advertisements that I had told myself were photoshopped over the years. I couldn't believe it. Was I one of those people with good lips now?? I thought I had been genetically doomed!I brought the big bottle of aquaphor with me to work, thinking I would need to reapply it to keep my magically healed lips moisturized and happy (after all, even with the most moisturizing chapsticks I still had to reapply every couple of hours). I didn't need it the whole day, even after eating and wiping off my lips. The cracks never reappeared, my lips didn't dry out, no dead peeling skin in sight! I started wearing lipstick sometimes, never having to worry about it collecting on my dead flakey skin.Now, all I do is rub a thin bead of Aquaphor on my lips right before bed (it only takes a little - this bottle is going to last me several years!). Sometimes I get so used to healthy, uncracked lips that I forget to use Aquaphor for a few days, and then my lips start peeling again. All it takes is one application at night and they're back to being healthy and moisturized again! I squeezed some Aquaphor into a little contained to bring with me when I travel, but I don't even bother keeping it in my purse any more because I never need it throughout the day. I used to buy chapstick in bulk so I would always have one or two in every purse, upstairs, downstairs, in my car, at work, or anywhere I'd be. No more! This humble product has changed my life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won't regret buying this Healing Ointment!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a moisturizer that would last and protect my skin. After reading reviews and comparing to other moisturizers, I chose this product because it's water repellent but still lets air through while working wonders on your skin. I use this all the time now and rarely use regular lotion. It keeps my skin hydrated and to my surprise also helps with crepe looking skin. We've also used this on burns and small cuts, and it works very well, highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So I actually bought this mainly for my lips. I’m one of those lip balm addict types of people lol.If you’re like me- I will say this ointment works wonders on my lips and makes them soft and hydrated in a way that the little tube of Aquaphor lip repair simply can't do. Much less greasy feel, and I don’t have to reapply nearly as often. It also leaves them feeling smooth and leaves the results lasting longer as well, making it well worth the larger size. Definitely would recommend over the tube of Aquaphor lip repair, especially for anyone looking for an actual solution to dry lips as opposed to just a temporary fix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a recommendation. Damn does this work well. I had cuts on my hand from dry hands. Washing my hands too often and not using lotion. It felt so good the second day I notice cuts going away. It kinda reminds me of Vaselin. Not sure if it’s the same thing. Same texture feel to it. Minus the smell of vaseline

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The oy thing you need for cracked skin
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many varieties of creams for cracked skin. None worked for me. But this one does what it says it does. After showering, I use a callus remover and then put a generous amount on my heels, wear socks, and go to bed every night. After just three nights, the transformation is unbelievable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for healing new tattoos
reviews.reviewText: I have been using aquaphor on my tattoos for as long as I can remember. It works wonders for healing fresh tattoos, better than any lotion or cream. Its more like a salve though, kinda like Vasoline. It also works great on dry cracked feet. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product has saved my skin, lips, and nails unlike any other product can. I never go without it and use it all day every single day.

reviews.reviewText: Its a thick gelatinous cream, not white, a bit like Vaseline.
Pros:1- package provides a lot of product2- the ointment is really powerful and helps with irritated or cracked, dry skin3- no smell4- no clothes stainingCons:1- noneRecommended? Yes!

Had horrible dry & chapped lips that just wouldn't heal with any sort of lip balm. Finally used this and it's a lifesaver! Nourished and healed the chapped lips. Also used it on dry, cracked feet. Makes them baby soft and heals well. A must for the dry winters.
A truly excellent product!A student bought this as a present, ＆ I haven't stopped using it since. Amazing, really does what it says. Intensive relief for winter cracks, broken skin, etc.
